page.title: 20Scholar Green Primary School
page.content: Scholar Green Primary School offers an education for children aged 4 to 11 years. The school was opened in 1968 and is of a traditional design with seven classrooms and a Main Assembly/Dining Hall. There is a well stocked library area and a fully equipped kitchen for the preparation of school lunches. At the rear and to the sides of the building are two playgrounds, extensive playing fields and a large woodland containing many wild flowers grown and planted by the children and used widely as an environmental resource.
